content: make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 8 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into each of the next 2 sts 12 sts drip 16 chain 6 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 3 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into each of the next 3 sts 8 sts link to video https //youtu be/b6frzakhjy8 if you need help or have any questions feel free to message me i will respond as soon as possible and answer or clarify any questions you may have
